name: Magic maniac
description:
You can destroy anything you see (including yourself, of course), release spells carefully, kill malicious ninjas, and pick up coins; there is no real ending for now, if you like this mode, you can give some advice and encouragement, I'll see if I want to make a full game later.

The web engine may be stuttering, and you can get a better experience by downloading PC version

WSDA for mobile

Right mouse button release magic ball

Left mouse button to release explosion magic

Automatically picks up coins when approached

(If you use the PC version, please use "Alt+F4" to exit the game,Yes, I didn't develop the pause menu (●ˇ∀ˇ●))
